## 

```{r}
library(readr)
library(ggplot2)
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)

gdpdata <- read_csv('NAMA_10R_3GDP.csv')
populationdata <- read_csv('DEMO_R_PJANAGGR3.csv')

gdpq <- gdpdata %>%
  select(TIME_PERIOD, geo, OBS_VALUE, unit) %>%
  filter(unit =='MIO_EUR' & geo %in% c('DE', 'FI', 'RO'))

mydata <- gdpq %>%
  left_join(populationdata, by=c("TIME_PERIOD","geo"),
            suffix = c("","_population")) %>%
  filter(age=='TOTAL' & sex=='T')

mydata <- mydata %>% 
  select(TIME_PERIOD, geo, OBS_VALUE,OBS_VALUE_population 
        ) #%>% 
  #head(n = 3)

mydata
  



```
